descriptions.description:
Transcriptome assemblies, each constructed from 6 individuals: 3 control and 3 cold shocked (1 h + 1 h recovery).
Acanthoxyla sp (6Acanth_Trinity_cdhit.fasta) Argosarchus horridus (6Argo_Trinity_cdhit.fasta) Asteliaphasma jucundum (6Ast_Trinity_cdhit.fasta) Clitarchus hookeri (6Cli_Trinity_cdhit.fasta) Micrarchus hystriculeus (6Paeng_cdhit.fasta) Micrarchus nov. sp. 2. Sewell Peak (6Sewell_cdhit.fasta) Spinotectarchus acornutus (6spino_Trinity_cdhit.fasta) Tectarchus ovobesus (6Tovo_Trinity_cdhit.fasta) Tectarchus salebrossus (6Tsal_Trinity_cdhit.fasta) Micrarchus nov. sp. 2. Mt. Arthur (12Arthur_cdhit.fasta)* Niveahpasma annulata (21Niv_Trinity_cdhit.fasta)**
* Micrarchus nov. sp. 2. Mt. Arthur assembly constructed from 6 control and 6 cold shocked individuals ** Niveahpasma annulata assembly constructed from 6 individuals (3 treatment, 3 control) from two locales (Dunedin and Remarkables), plus 9 additional individuals from an unpublished dataset (Nevis)
